sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
between two things
ali
in between two things
, ima eno od obeh stvari na eni strani in drugo na drugi strani.

seg.quote: She put the cigarette between her lips and lit it.
...Penn Close, Court Road, and all the little side streets in between.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo ali nekaj
is moving between two places
, se redno premika iz enega kraja v drugega in spet nazaj.

seg.quote: I have spent a lifetime commuting between Britain and the United States.

sense.def:
Odnos, pogovor ali razlika
between two people, groups, or things
zadeva ali se nanaša na obe osebi, skupini ali predmeta.

seg.quote: I asked whether there was much difference between British and European law.

sense.def:
Kadar imajo ljudje določeno količino nečesa
between them
, je to celotna količina, ki jo imajo.

seg.quote: They have both been married before and have five children between them.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj razdeljeno
between people
, ima vsak svoj delež.

seg.quote: The land was divided equally between them.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
between
ali
in between two amounts or ages
, je nekje vmes med prvo in drugo količino ali starostjo.

Kadar nekaj stoji
between someone
in tistim, kar ta želi, preprečuje, da bi to dobil.

seg.quote: These men stand between you and the top jobs.

sense.def:
Kadar se nekaj zgodi
between
ali
in between two times or events
, se zgodi po prvem času ali dogodku in pred drugim.

seg.quote: The house was built between 1840 and 1852.
Between sessions I spent my time with my husband.

sense.def:
Kadar moramo izbrati
between two things
, se moramo odločiti za eno ali drugo stvar.

seg.quote: The choice is between defeat or survival.
